description.es: One morning, when Gregor Samsa woke from troubled dreams, he found himself transformed in his bed into a horrible vermin. He lay on his armour-like back
description.en: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit. Aenean commodo ligula eget dolor. Aenean massa. Cum sociis natoque penatibus et magnis dis parturient montes, nascetur ridiculus mus.

cards.title: The Fortune Cookie App
cards.short_desc: A digital deck of positive quotes.
cards.description: A small project that shows random quotes based on React Redux JS.

cards.title: Placer Monticello
cards.description: That project consist of making the look and feel of Pastas Monticello website based on Drupal CMS.

cards.title: Palermo Cultural
cards.description: The purpose of this project is create a SPA(Single Page Application) from a specific neighborhood that shows interesting spots using Google Maps APIs.

cards.title: Kamikaze Vs. Bugs
cards.description: The purpose of this project is customize a classic frogger arcade game according to the lessons that I learnt about Javascript Intermediate and Canvas 2D at Udacity Front-End Nanodegree Program.

cards.title: Colombia Weather Forecast
cards.short_desc: A weather forecast made in ReactJS
cards.description: The purpose of this project is create components that bring information about weather forecast in several cities of Colombia.

cards.title: Ruby Sinatra Workshops
cards.short_desc: A small app to store workshops
cards.description: This is a demo app to create workshops using Ruby and Sinatra. Milligram as micro CSS Framework.

cards.title: Angular CRUD Example
cards.description: A small app with CRUD operations using Angular 4 and Firebase.

cards.title: Gestión Integral
cards.description: The purpose of this project is create a MVC small app in Laravel 5.5 that store customers from many cities in Colombia.

cards.title: Feedreader Jasmine T
cards.description: Given a web-based application that reads RSS feeds. How to use Jasmine to write a number of tests against a pre-existing application.

description.es:
Technical: HTML5, CSS3, SASS, Bootstrap, TailwindCSS, JavaScript, jQuery, Vue.js 3 Composition API, Pinia, ReactJS, Redux, PHP, Laravel, MySQL, GIT, Postman, SCRUM.
Hard: MVC, SPA, Component-based architecture, BEM, responsive design, APIs, UX/UI, performance.
Soft: Problem-solving, creative, methodical, visually appealing, detail-oriented, quality-focused, sensitive.
Languages: Spanish(Native), English(Intermediate B2)
description.en:
Technical: HTML5, CSS3, SASS, Bootstrap, TailwindCSS, JavaScript, jQuery, Vue.js 3 Composition API, Pinia, ReactJS, Redux, PHP, Laravel, MySQL, GIT, Postman, SCRUM.

description.es: Apasionada Desarrolladora Front-End con más de 5 años de experiencia creando interfaces centradas en el usuario para aplicaciones web de impacto. Experta en la traducción de diseños UI/UX en sitios web visualmente atractivos y responsivos que priorizan la experiencia del usuario en todos los dispositivos. Posee una sólida trayectoria de colaboración con equipos de diseño, garantizando la viabilidad técnica y entregando interfaces de usuario de alta calidad. Adicionalmente, es responsable de apoyar el desarrollo de nuevas funcionalidades orientadas al usuario, asegurando que el sitio web permanezca amigable, visualmente atractivo y adaptable de acuerdo a los requerimientos del proyecto y la viabilidad técnica.
description.en: Passionate Front-End Developer with 5+ years of experience crafting user-centric interfaces for impactful web applications. Skilled in translating UI/UX designs into visually appealing and responsive websites that prioritize user experience across all devices. She has a strong track record of collaboration with design teams, ensuring technical feasibility and delivering high-quality user interfaces. Additionally, she is responsible for supporting the development of new user-facing features, ensuring the website remains user-friendly, visually appealing and responsive according to project requirements and technical feasibility.
